pullrequest.title: issue #1144 fix inertia ratio reduction error with hardcoded ratio limit. check for violation of line criterion. added test.

content.raw: The code of this test seems to be the same as the one in TrikeyWheelResponse, except for the world file loaded. I would suggest to keep just a single TrikeyWheelResponse() function with an extra parameter (cons std::string &_worldFile for example). Then, you can just call the same function with the two different world files that the tests are using.
content.html: The code of this test seems to be the same as the one in TrikeyWheelResponse, except for the world file loaded. I would suggest to keep just a single TrikeyWheelResponse() function with an extra parameter (cons std::string &_worldFile for example). Then, you can just call the same function with the two different world files that the tests are using.
